Key: Huhhh? Where am I?! Why are you here, darling?

Miku... Right back at you. What are you doing
here?

Hehe～ I don't know what's going on, but I feel
like something wonderful's happened～

Don't tell me you had a dream where you were at my
house and claiming to be my fiancé.

What? How did you know, darling? Can you tell
because we've been connected by fate?
I don't know about that... Haha...
I honestly don't mind at all being your fiancée～

But I'm going to go home now, okay?
Bye-bye, darling!

Miku... seemed unfazed. That's unexpected. Maybe
it's because she's air-headed. Or maybe it's just
her experience as an idol and being on stage...
